abstract: Skier Picabo Street is charged with assault and domestic violence after allegedly pushing her father down stairs in Park City, Utah, home.
snippet: The Olympic gold-medalist skier Picabo Street has been charged with assault and domestic violence after authorities say she pushed her father down the stairs in a home in Park City, Utah, on Dec. 23.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic gold-medalist skier Picabo Street has been charged with assault and domestic violence after authorities say she pushed her father down the stairs in a home in Park City, Utah, on Dec. 23.
